about_the_game:
"Light of the Labyrinth" is a thrilling maze adventure game where you must navigate through complex labyrinths, avoid deadly traps, and find your way to the exit. Each maze presents a new challenge, pushing your problem-solving and strategy skills to the limit.

Explore intricately designed levels filled with traps, secret paths, and obstacles. Every move counts, and you must think carefully to avoid dangers lurking in the shadows. The game features various maze designs, each more difficult than the last, providing an ever-evolving challenge.

Key Features:

  • Challenging maze puzzles with increasing difficulty

  • Multiple maze designs with hidden secrets and surprises

  • Atmospheric design and immersive environments

  • Progressive levels that test your skills and patience

name: Light of the Labyrinth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: 4 hardware CPU threads - Intel® Core™ i5 750 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Navigate your way through a maze filled with challenging traps! Make smart moves to reach the exit and overcome the dangers.
